title: Beef and green bean stir fry
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons fish sauce', '4 tablespoons low salt soy sauce', '1 dash sesame oil', '900g beef steak, sirloin or fillet, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chpped', '3 spring onions, cut into 5cm pieces', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '250g frozen fine whole green beans, partially thawed', '125ml low salt beef stock', '2 tablespoons lime juice', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh Thai basil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', '1 pinch crushed chillies or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander']
